version":1}

createVault(string,string,string,string,.details: The vaultSiteId must refer to an existing site in VaultSiteRegistry.      The vaultId must be unique. Capacity and dimensions are static design      parameters; live utilization is computed off-chain.

params.lastAuditDate: Date of last audit (ISO-8601 string, may be empty).
params.vaultGoldCapacityKg: Maximum designed gold capacity in kilograms.
params.vaultSiteId: Identifier of the parent vault site (must exist).

returns.success: Always true if the call does not revert.

getAllVaultIds().details: Intended for off-chain enumeration and indexing.

returns.vaultIds: Array of all registered vault IDs.

params.vaultSiteId: Identifier of the parent vault site.

returns.vaultIds: Array of vault IDs belonging to the site.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateVaultStatus(string,uint8,string,st.details: Reason is primarily used when marking a vault OUT_OF_SERVICE, but can      also be used for audit notes on other status changes. If lastAuditDate      is non-empty, it overwrites the stored lastAuditDate.

params.lastAuditDate: Updated last audit date (ISO-8601 string, optional).
params.vaultId: Identifier of the vault to update.

returns.success: Always true if the call does not revert.

returns.exists: True if the vault is registered.

createVault(string,string,string,string,.notice: Create a new vault within an existing vault site.

getAllVaultIds().notice: Returns the list of all vault IDs known to the registry.

getVault(string).notice: Returns all stored details for a given vault.

getVaultIdsBySite(string).notice: Returns the list of vault IDs registered under a given vault site.

memberRegistry().notice: MemberRegistry used for role-based access control.

updateVaultStatus(string,uint8,string,st.notice: Update the status and optionally the audit date of a vault.

vaultExistsView(string).notice: Checks whether a vault with the given ID exists.

vaultSiteRegistry().notice: Registry of vault sites used to validate vaultSiteId.
